channel.title: Augmented Reality (AR) on DillonBaird.io
channel.description: Recent content in Augmented Reality (AR) on DillonBaird.io

item.title: Wireless External Storage With Native Plex Server
item.description: When Apple launched the Vision Pro, it promised a revolution in spatial computing. But for those of us who love to consume and create media, the limited internal storage quickly became a glaring issue. Enter the WD My Passport Wireless Pro, an unassuming device that has transformed my Vision Pro experience. It’s more than just an external drive; it’s a portable media server, a productivity hub, and a travel essential – all in one sleek package.

item.title: A Developer's Journey With Spacial Computing
item.description: When I first slid on the Apple Vision Pro, I was bracing myself for another overhyped gadget. Instead, what I encountered was a transformative leap into the future of digital interaction. This wasn’t merely a high-tech toy; it was a tool that seamlessly wove itself into my daily coding rituals, shattering my preconceived limits of what technology could achieve. From that moment, I was hooked—immersed in a mixed reality that felt both groundbreaking and surprisingly intuitive.

item.title: XReal Beam - A Mobile Software Engineer's Best Friend
item.description: As a software engineer, I find myself in a perpetual dance with screens, gracefully navigating between lines of code, debugging sessions, and virtual meetings that blur the lines between work and leisure. Whether I’m immersing myself in the complexities of programming or unwinding with my favorite YouTube channels, these screens have become an inseparable part of my daily routine, almost an extension of my digital existence. So, when whispers of the XReal Beam, a revolutionary device promising to redefine my screen experience, reached my eager ears, I couldn’t help but be drawn in by the intrigue and excitement.

item.title: Work From Anywhere using the XReal Air AR Glasses
item.description: From ergonomic benefits to a virtual triple monitor setup, learn how you can make remote work a reality with the XReal Air AR glasses.
